item.title: 暗网论坛试图通过转向注重隐私的加密货币来隐藏自己
美联储的两个新矛盾
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 被制裁的石油商 2Rivers 表示已停止交易
item.description: 一家因经营俄罗斯石油而在 12 月受到英国制裁的能源贸易公司周五表示，它将在 2024 年底停止贸易业务。【原文：An energy trading house sanctioned in December by the UK for handling Russian oil said Friday it ceased trading operations at the end of 2024.】

item.title: 创业公司 Too Good To Go 筹集 3 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Too Good To Go公司正在考虑在新一轮融资中筹集2亿欧元（约合2.31亿美元）至3亿欧元，以支持其业务扩张。【原文：Too Good To Go, which operates an app that allows users to buy near-expired food at a discount, is considering raising €200 million ($231 million) to €300 million in a new funding round to support its business expansion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 参议院通过稳定币法案后，Circle 首次获得买入评级
item.description: 在美国参议院本周通过立法，为与美元挂钩的加密货币制定监管规则之后，Seaport Global首次给予这家稳定币发行商买入评级，Circle Internet Group Inc.的股价周五最高上涨了17%。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc.’s shares rose as much as 17% on Friday after Seaport Global gave the stablecoin issuer its first buy rating in the wake of the US Senate’s move this week to pass legislation setting up regulatory rules for cryptocurrencies pegged to the dollar.】

item.title: 亚马逊终止起亚 Soul 的快速送货服务，转而雇佣临时工
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在结束让驾驶起亚 Souls 的司机进行当日送货的实验，转而依靠其 "千兆经济 "工人网络。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is ending an experiment that saw drivers in Kia Souls make same-day deliveries and will rely on its network of gig-economy workers instead.】

item.title: Telegram 如何成为极端分子和犯罪活动的 "磁铁
item.description: 信息服务 Telegram 是全球下载量最大的应用程序之一。它的私密聊天设置使其成为专制政权国家公开讨论的自由空间。但是，Telegram 对内容审核采取的相对宽松的方式，让试图阻止犯罪活动和错误信息传播的政府感到沮丧，而这些活动和信息传播会破坏社会稳定。【原文：Messaging service Telegram is one of the most downloaded apps worldwide. Its private chat setting has made it a free space for open discussion in countries with authoritarian regimes. But a relatively light-touch approach to content moderation on Telegram is frustrating governments trying to stop criminal activities and the spread of misinformation that can destabilize societies.】

item.title: 芯片股因有关中国可能受到新限制的报道而下滑
item.description: 在《华尔街日报》报道特朗普政府正在考虑对中国采取进一步限制措施后，台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司和其他芯片制造商的股价周五下滑。【原文：Shares of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and other chipmakers slid on Friday after the Wall Street Journal reported that the Trump administration is considering further restrictions on China.】

item.title: 新兴市场摆脱中东风险，美国银行大举避险
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）表示，随着投资者对地缘政治紧张局势升级带来的风险越来越自满，欧洲、中东和非洲地区的货币押注为美元反弹提供了最佳对冲。【原文：Currency bets across Europe, Middle East and Africa offer the best hedges against a rebound in the US dollar as investors grow complacent about risks from escalating geopolitical tensions, Bank of America Corp. says.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺的 "中国磁铁快速流动 "尚未兑现
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布与中国政府达成 "已完成 "的贸易协议已近 10 天，但美国公司对何时能从中国收到至关重要的磁铁，以及华盛顿方面是否会允许恢复大量其他出口产品，仍然一无所知。【原文：Almost 10 days since President Donald Trump declared a “done” trade deal with Beijing, US companies remain largely in the dark on when they’ll receive crucial magnets from China — and whether Washington, in turn, will allow a host of other exports to resume.】

item.title: 美联储称劳动力市场平衡，指出移民速度放缓
item.description: 美联储周五表示，移民数量的急剧下降导致工人供应增长速度放缓，有助于在就业增长降温的情况下保持劳动力市场的平衡。【原文：A sharp stepdown in immigration has led the supply of workers to grow more slowly, helping to keep the labor market in balance as job growth cools, the Federal Reserve said Friday.】

item.title: 研究显示，中国和低收入国家对人工智能的信任度最高
item.description: 联合国的一项研究发现，全球对人工智能的态度存在巨大差异，低收入国家对人工智能的信任度最高，而富裕国家则对人工智能持怀疑态度。【原文：A United Nations study found a sharp global divide on attitudes toward artificial intelligence, with trust strongest in low-income countries and skepticism high in wealthier ones.】

item.title: 加拿大加密货币公司努力创造首个本地稳定币
item.description: 在美国参议院推进影响深远的稳定币立法的同时，加拿大公司也在努力为本国用户提供最基本的稳定币产品。【原文：While the US Senate advanced far-reaching stablecoin legislation, Canadian companies are pushing to get even the most basic stablecoin products available for users in the country.】

item.title: 敦促法国立法者取消可再生能源项目暂停令
item.description: 法国的可再生能源产业敦促立法者放弃暂停批准新的太阳能和风能项目的立法提案，称这将破坏就业机会，并阻碍法国限制使用污染性化石燃料的计划。【原文：France’s renewable energy industry urged lawmakers to ditch proposed legislation that would impose a moratorium on approving new solar and wind projects, saying it would destroy jobs and stall the nation’s plan to curb its use of polluting fossil fuels.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔对七月降息抱有希望，美国股市上涨
item.description: 周五美国股市上涨，原因是投资者从六一节假期回来，评估美联储一位高级官员最近的言论以及以色列和伊朗冲突的最新进展。【原文：US stocks rose on Friday as investors returned from the Juneteenth holiday break to evaluate recent comments from a top Federal Reserve official as well as the latest developments in the conflict between Israel and Iran.】

item.title: 德国初创企业 Neura Robotics 筹集高达 10 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德国初创公司Neura Robotics正瞄准筹集多达10亿欧元（12亿美元）的新资金，因为该公司准备首次推出一款仿人机器人。【原文：German startup Neura Robotics is targeting to raise as much as €1 billion ($1.2 billion) in new funding as the company prepares to debut a humanoid robot, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本电产首席执行官强调合规，不再一味追求增长
item.description: 日本电产公司（Nidec Corp. ）创始人永守重信（Shigenobu Nagamori）表示，这家日本精密电机制造商正在将合规放在首位，摆脱长达半个世纪以来对利润和增长的关注。【原文：Nidec Corp. founder Shigenobu Nagamori said the Japanese maker of precision motors is prioritizing compliance, stepping away from a half-century-long focus on profit and growth.】

item.title: 尽管以色列和伊朗发动攻击，中东石油仍源源不断
item.description: 自以色列和伊朗开始互射导弹一周以来，油轮通过关键的霍尔木兹海峡的情况基本保持稳定。【原文：A week since Israel and Iran started to exchange missile barrages, oil tanker transits through the critical Strait of Hormuz have remained largely steady.】

item.title: 调查显示：美元正岌岌可危，难以撼动其避风港地位
item.description: 彭博脉搏》（Bloomberg Pulse）最新调查显示，中东冲突升级可能有助于美元继续发挥避风港作用，但也仅仅是如此。【原文：The escalating Middle East conflict is likely to help the dollar hold on to its haven role — but only just, the latest Bloomberg Pulse survey shows.】

item.title: Meta 推出售价 399 美元、可录制 3K 视频的奥克利人工智能眼镜
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司的智能眼镜一鸣惊人，它与奥克利（Oakley）合作推出的新款智能眼镜面向运动员，并改进了视频录制功能。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is going up-market with its surprise hit smart glasses, rolling out new models with Oakley that are aimed at athletes and include improved video recording.】

item.title: 数以千计的下岗政府工作人员涌入日益萎缩的就业市场
item.description: 在特朗普政府削减成本的运动中被解雇的数千名政府私人顾问正越来越多地涌入日益萎缩的劳动力市场。【原文：Thousands of private government consultants laid off during the Trump administration’s cost-cutting crusade are increasingly flooding a shrinking labor market.】

item.title: ICG 旗舰灵活资本基金的目标是 100 亿欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Intermediate Capital Group Plc.正寻求为其旗舰项目灵活资本战略融资 100 亿欧元（115 亿美元）。【原文：Intermediate Capital Group Plc. is looking to raise €10 billion ($11.5 billion) for its flagship flexible capital strategy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃勒称美联储最快七月降息
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，央行最快可能在下个月降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said the central bank can lower interest rates as soon as next month.】

item.title: 加拿大 5 月零售销售额下降 1.1%，创一年来最大降幅
item.description: 上个月，在关税导致价格上涨之前抢购汽车的热潮似乎告一段落，加拿大消费者的压力变得更加明显。【原文：The strain on Canadian consumers became more evident last month after a rush to buy cars ahead of price increases from tariffs appeared to come to an end.】

item.title: 投资者面临最后期限，马斯克的 xAI 为债务发行增添甜头
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI Corp.周五为其50亿美元的债务发行向投资者提供了更优惠的定价，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）也在同一天结束了对这笔交易的承诺。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI Corp. offered investors sweeter pricing on its $5 billion debt offering Friday, the same day Morgan Stanley is wrapping up commitments for the deal.】

item.title: 特斯拉将于七月在印度开设展厅，展示中国制造的电动汽车
item.description: 熟悉相关讨论的人士称，特斯拉公司将于7月在印度开设首家展厅，从而拉开在全球第三大汽车市场正式运营的序幕，因为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的这家公司正在欧洲和中国销量下滑的情况下寻求增长。【原文：Tesla Inc. is set to open its first showrooms in India in July, people familiar with the discussions said, kicking off formal operations in the world’s third-biggest automobile market as the Elon Musk-led firm hunts for growth amid falling sales in Europe and China.】

item.title: 七月炎热天气给欧洲电力供应带来压力
item.description: 据研究公司 Energy Aspects 称，今年夏天欧洲更炎热的天气有可能导致需求上升，同时导致水电和核电厂的产量下降。【原文：Hotter weather in Europe this summer risks driving up demand while causing output from hydropower and nuclear plants to fall, according to research firm Energy Aspects.】

item.title: 英国央行抽走流动性，银行提高存款利率
item.description: 英国银行向客户提供异常高的利率以吸引现金，这是英国央行缩减资产负债表导致系统流动性萎缩的最新迹象。【原文：UK banks are offering unusually high interest rates to clients in order to attract cash, the latest sign of how the Bank of England’s balance-sheet reduction is shrinking liquidity in the system.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，印度央行选择大幅降息以促进经济增长
item.description: 印度央行周五的货币政策会议纪要显示，印度央行行长表示，在全球不确定的情况下，前置降息和现金刺激将为印度经济提供支持。【原文：India’s central bank governor said that front-loaded interest rate cut and the cash boost would support the Indian economy amid global uncertainties, minutes of the central bank’s monetary policy meeting showed Friday.】

item.title: 电力是渴求电力的美国的新鸡蛋
item.description:
过去一年中，公用事业账单上涨了4.5%，几乎是更广泛的消费者价格指数涨幅的两倍。【原文：

Utility bills jumped 4.5% in the past year, almost double the gains for the broader consumer price index.

】
